english.segment1: . Lover of my soul. I want to tell You. Only You have all of me
english.segment2: I cannot contain. My adoration. I'm in love so desperately
english.segment3: No one is as lovely as You are. And there is no one else who has my heart
english.segment4: Jesus, You have me completely. Every breath that I breathe. I am absolutely in love. Jesus, I am Yours forever. All of me surrenders. I am absolutely in love with You
english.segment5: Down upon my knees. I'm lost in worship. Humbled by Your majesty
english.segment6: What is there to say. But how I love You. Thank You for forgiving me
english.segment7: All I am is Yours. Only Yours
